Key Match Events: DJ Herz threw five no-hit innings in the first game.
Dylan Crews finished 2-for-3 with a walk, double, home run, and a pair of RBIs in the first game.
Bryan De La Cruz bounced into a game-ending double play in the first game.
Ryan Borucki surrendered a two-run homer to Andres Chaparro in the second game.
Aroldis Chapman allowed a four-run rally in the ninth inning of the second game, leading to the Nationals' 8-6 comeback victory.
Post-Match Reflections: Derek Shelton expressed frustration over the recurring issues and the inability to close out games.
Mitch Keller highlighted the importance of bouncing back from poor outings.
Derek Shelton emphasized the need for better defensive support for pitchers.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Saturday marked just the second doubleheader of the Pirates’ 2024 season and the first that took place at PNC Park.
